metadata.name: LAYERS #1
metadata.description:
Developed by gallery-led platform DRP.io, LAYERS by Vhils is the first evolutionary NFT project in which collectors can co-create artworks through interacting with tokens on-chain. Each NFT is revealed layer-by-layer through holders choosing how to "tear” their artworks.

How you tear your LAYER also determines your collector journey as part of Vhils’ collector community and your access to his calendar of exclusive art projects, on and off chain. Through staking, burning and merging NFTs at various stages of reveal, LAYERS can be converted into physical artworks, NFTs and experiences.
